amendment.description: To provide for a reserve fund for legislation to provide access, coverage, and choice for every American to quality and affordable care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4302 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4302 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S2083-2084; text: CR S2083) To provide for a reserve fund for legislation to provide access, coverage, and choice for every American to quality and affordable care.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4302 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4302 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Gregg.
